survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Scooter Sharing Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to understand their satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies of use.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes), with an optional text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters when you need them?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters when you need them?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: Please describe any issues you have encountered while using electric scooter sharing services.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Use a text box with a character limit of 500.

script.question_text: Please describe any issues you have encountered while using electric scooter sharing services.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend electric scooter sharing services to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Include a neutral option.

script.question_text: Would you recommend electric scooter sharing services to others?
